header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: elderly grandma, care arrangements, business partners, Literary adaptations, grandchildren, jeans
header.activity: Family chat over peas and chips
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, anecdote telling

speaker.occupation: Former role as technical esport of development planning in oil industry
